fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Convert someone into the Neutral role nearest to their current post number. In the event of a tie, it will be the one below their post number.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You know all Neutral roles in the game at all times.
- If a member of an informed faction is converted to a Neutral, they will keep their win condition the same until all other members of that faction are dead or converted. Only factional heads can be converted to Neutral (Killing).
- If you try to convert someone who is already Neutral, they will be rerolled into another completely random neutral.
- The Crew faction counts as an "informed faction," however you do not need to kill them to win.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all opposing factions and leave only Neutrals alive.
